channel.title: New client help when adding torva full helm to my 317 error
channel.description:
when i add torva full helm to my server i compile and its fine and everything i go to spawn it in game and my client freezes and this error comes up in the .bat file
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -47 at Model.method479(Model.java:1047) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:1591) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:1480) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8411) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1914) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8206) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8953) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4710) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
could anyone help me? thanks and i havent added another torva parts yet =)))

item.title: New client help when adding torva full helm to my 317 error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So I’m not seeing anything related to your error in that code.

To be honest, your error is something with sprites or interfaces… Post your RSInterface class (RSInterface.java, you can’t read a .class file lol)

Read full topic
item.source: New client help when adding torva full helm to my 317 error

item.title: New client help when adding torva full helm to my 317 error
item.dc:creator: @babushkahead babushkahead
item.description:
@babushkahead wrote:

case 13362:
itemDef.name = “Torva Full Helm”;
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.modelID = 67442;
itemDef.modelZoom = 724;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 81;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1670;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -4;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 66475;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 66858;
itemDef.description = “Provides excellent protection.”.getBytes();
break;

and this is in client help isnt it?

Read full topic
